```{=html}
<script>
  const password = prompt("Enter password:");
  const correct = "bigbear";
  window.onload = () => {
    if (password === correct) {
      document.getElementById("protected-content").style.display = "block";
    } else {
      document.body.innerHTML = "<h1>Access Denied</h1>";
    }
  }
</script>
```
